sentences.english: There’s an awful lot of common sense reasons not to frequent prostitutes while going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 太多太多的常识教导我们在国外不要嫖妓。

sentences.english: Alex Ho Wai-tao has been held by mainland authorities since last week for allegedly visiting a prostitute.
sentences.chinese: 何伟途涉嫌嫖妓，自上周起被大陆公安拘留。

sentences.english: Only 6% of the men we spoke to had been arrested for soliciting ­prostitutes.
sentences.chinese: 只有6%的受访者因为嫖妓遭遇过逮捕。

definition: lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to spend the night at a brothel
to carry on a clandestine love affair
to cohabit with and financially support a mistress
to visit a prostitute/(literary) to buy wine or drinks
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation

pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4
